author: bsunanda
body: Apply the effect of neutral density filter if TestNumbering is enabled. So if GEN-SIM is done with TestNumbering, one can choose separate grouping with different neutral density filter
title: bsunanda:Run2-hcx98 Enable possibility of running GEN-SIM for some 2017 geometry and choosing Plan0/1/36 at DIGI-RECO level
